Text: 💔🎈A group of performance artists gathered in Brazil's capital of Brasilia on Monday to honour the 30,000 victims of #Covid19 in the country. As of Monday evening, Brazil had confirmed more than 529,000 #coronavirus cases and 30,058 deaths. https://t.co/49oVrMgpyQ

The inquests into COVID19 deaths, all delayed at present, will be a defining moment. If Johnson hasn't set up a public inquiry by then it will force him to do so, and the interplay between the inquests ; the inquiry will be vital to forcing HMG to reveal the truth

My hood, like many others, got destroyed by looters and fascists using a crime executed in a democratic city as the excuse- and this moron thinks trump is declaring war on America?  Is he sick, stupid or both?

Trump just had peaceful demonstrators viciously attacked.  No, Mr. President. This is not a dictatorship. This is the United States of America. Our citizens have a constitutional right to peacefully protest. It's called the First Amendment.
